title: No limitation of provisions by implication
context: ยง53-39 No limitation of provisions by implication. No provision in this part applicable specially or only to a redevelopment corporation shall be construed to limit by implication the applicability of this part or any other provision thereof to any other person or corporation. [L 1949, c 379, ยง23; RL 1955, ยง143-38; HRS ยง53-39]
